Topic.Title: So when is the MacOSX client coming?

Posts.EditableText: Considering you said in August of 2011 that it would eventually come: https://blog.textadventures.co.uk/2011/08/30/quest-5-0-is-out-now/
Posts.HTML: Considering you said in August of 2011 that it would eventually come: https://blog.textadventures.co.uk/2011/08/30/quest-5-0-is-out-now/

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

The person whom you are addressing is no longer involved with Quest or this site.

...but he did make several attempts to make this happen, all to no avail.  (I think he knew a lot about Windows, but not so much about Mac or Linux at the time.)

There are a few of us who are trying to make this happen, but the wheels are currently turning slowly.  (Most of us know more about Windows than anything else, too.  Plus, the source code is quite complex, and most of it depends on Windows features.)

Are you a developer?  If so, we'd love some help porting Quest to Mac!

https://github.com/textadventures/
Posts.HTML:
Hello.

The person whom you are addressing is no longer involved with Quest or this site.

...but he did make several attempts to make this happen, all to no avail. (I think he knew a lot about Windows, but not so much about Mac or Linux at the time.)

There are a few of us who are trying to make this happen, but the wheels are currently turning slowly. (Most of us know more about Windows than anything else, too. Plus, the source code is quite complex, and most of it depends on Windows features.)

Are you a developer? If so, we'd love some help porting Quest to Mac!

https://github.com/textadventures/
